Issues.Title: Refactor Clipboard to make it testable
Issues.Body:
Related to #416

Ideally we would refactor clipboard code so that all calls to win32 OLE* methods are exposed by a single class (OleClipboard) and published as a public interface and a constructor that takes object that implements that interface as a parameter. Then the test will mock the IOleClipboard interface and use constructor that takes this mock as a parameter.
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "Refactor Clipboard to make it testable" (#459)

Issues.Title: Support IDragSourceHelper/IDragTargetHelper?
Issues.Body: These two interfaces are used to support enhanced drag-and-drop support, including (most importantly for me) the ability to specify a custom image to be displayed under the cursor during the drag. While this can be done in C# today by using COM interop, you have to roll your own `IDataObject` implementation to do so, as the default Windows Forms one does not support setting arbitrary COM-based private formats into the data object, per Windows requirements. Would it be possible to update the Windows Forms `DataObject` class to enable this? (It would be even better if there would be higher-level code added to obviate the need to do custom COM interop to use thesee features, but I do not know what the API design for that would look like.) Thanks!
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "Support IDragSourceHelper/IDragTargetHelper?" (#457)

Issues.Title: SuppressMessage Which one to keep, which one to remove?
Issues.Body:
A search of our repo indicates that we use the SuppressMessage attribute on the following Microsoft.* binaries:

* Performance
* Reliability
* Design
* Usage
* Portability
* Interopability
* Reliability
* Security
* Globalization
* Naming

It would be useful in the future (mostly because we are occasionally porting components from framework) to create a list about the SuppressMessages that we would like to keep or get rid of. If it's possible to come up with such a list.

In PR #439 I am adding Microsoft.Usage.
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "SuppressMessage Which one to keep, which one to remove?" (#448)

Issues.Title: Exclude documentation files from NuGet package
Issues.Body:
@zsd4yr requested that XML files produced during the build not be included in the NuGet package produced for the repository. This change implements that request.

If this request was documented by an issue, please feel free to link it. 👍
Issues.RelatedDescription: Closed or merged PR "Exclude documentation files from NuGet package" (#441)

Issues.Title: rename binlog
Issues.Body:
* different workaround than previous checkin
* allows us to rely again on the eng/Common build.ps1 and tools.ps1 and not role our own
* uses /bl msbuild argument to name the binary log

Still not the most ideal solution if: Arcade changes where the logging directory is.
Issues.RelatedDescription: Closed or merged PR "rename binlog" (#440)
